trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display when the activity associated with the designer cannot be modified.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer displays LockedActivityGlyph when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A> property is set to `true`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref> class.
Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the glyph is associated.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
designer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity design surface.
An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref> on the activity design surface.
